name: Lizard Tower The Abyss
description:
Throw flares at the beacons. You know how it is.

*****

A collaboration with G.P.

A TOJam 2021 original.

Music pairing: Ghosts I-IV, by Nine Inch Nails
Drink pairing: Ichor

CONTROLS
wads – move around
mouse – look around
space – jump (press again to jetpack, eventually)
i – invert mouse-y
left-click – throw a flare
